name: Ro_bit
description:
Plot

Ro_bit is a fresh off the assembly line robot, whose purpose is to serve and protect humanity. However, Ro_bit's loyalty to humanity is put to the test after the facility where he was created, is attacked. Ro_bit must now find out who is the cause of the attack against the facility and stop them.

Controls

  • Arrow-Keys - Move Ro_bit
  • C - Secondary Weapon
  • SPACE - Jump
  • X - Action key
  • Z - Shoot
  • Ctrl - Switch between Secondary Weapons
  • V - Switch between Secondary Weapons
  • Enter - Pause

This game is in early development so all assets and areas shown do not represent the final product.

Cheat Codes

Code

Description

Invincibility

All Keys

JUST_CHILL_BRO

All cooling cells

CANT_TOUCH_ME

Infinite shield power

CHALLENGE_ACCEPTED

Hardcore Mode unlocked

Infinite ammo for missiles and grenades

GIMME_DA_MISSILES

Max missile count

ROLLIN_ROLLIN

Max grenade count

SHIELD

Shield power up

MISSILES

Missile power up

Grenade power up

MEGA SUIT

Mega armor
